---
description: How to define composable, testable, type-safe repository templates with create.
title: About Building Templates
---

So you'd like to build a repository template with Bingo.
Wonderful!

For a minimal template quickstart, see [Blog > Your First Bingo Template](/blog/your-first-bingo-template).

To learn more about templates, read:

1. [Concepts > Creations](/build/concepts/creations): for the pieces of repositories templates may define
2. [Concepts > Modes](/build/concepts/modes): manging the two execution modes Bingo may run in
3. [Concepts > Templates](/build/concepts/templates): describing templates themselves
